meanings.sent1: The postorbital bone provides protection for the eye area.
meanings.sent2: The postorbital region of the skull is crucial for supporting the eye socket.
meanings.sent3: The postorbital position of the helmet made it look like a futuristic design.
meanings.sent4: Her postorbital gaze seemed to see right through me.
meanings.sent5: The postorbital placement of the mirror reflected the light perfectly.

meanings.definition: A bone or structure situated behind the eye socket.
meanings.sent1: The postorbital in the skull helps in forming the eye socket.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the postorbital to understand its role in skull structure.
meanings.sent3: The postorbital bone rolled off the table and startled the researchers.
meanings.sent4: The postorbital resembled a tiny bridge connecting the eye socket to the skull.
meanings.sent5: Careful examination revealed a fracture in the postorbital of the fossilized skull.
